title: Short-Intensive Course on Optimized Treatment Management Strategies for Heart Failure Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and patient care procedures
context.additional_context: Project-based and case analysis-focused education for current practitioners to enhance heart failure patient management competencies in a blended learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five or more core principles of the latest heart failure treatment guidelines through online modules.
Learners can develop personalized medication plans for patients by analyzing real-world cases in face-to-face workshops.
Learners can develop and present a three-phase management strategy to reduce hospital readmission rates through PBL team projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
